definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be or grow dim, faint (NH id.; Aram. [[כְּהָא]]; cf. Ar. kahiya be 0’akhay, i.e. weak, cowardly)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[כָּֽהֲתָה]] De 34:7; Impf. [[יִכְהֶה]] Is 42:4; 3 fs. [[תִּכְהֶה]] Zec 11:17; [[וַתֵּ֫כַהּ]] Job 17:7; [[וַתִּכְהֶיןָ]] Ge 27:1; Inf. abs. [[כָּהׂה]] Zec 11:17; —grow dim, of eye Ge 27:1 (J), De 34:7, Job 17:7; of violent putting out of eye Zec 11:17, Zec 11:17; he shall not grow dim Is 42:4, of servant of ´[[י]] under fig. of lamp or fire (v. Kay Che De), or grow faint (cf. Di).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[וְכִהֲתָה]] consec. Ez Eze 21:12 (subj. [[כָּל־רוּחַ]]; ‖[[וְנׇמֵס כָּל־לֵב]]) grow faint (Pi intrans., Ges:§ 52 k, Kö:i. 187; but rd. perh. [[כָּֽהֲתָה]]).
